Container.Name: Facet
Container.Overview: A self-hosted personal profile platform. Own your data, control what each audience sees, skip the tracking. Think LinkedIn meets personal portfolio, except you hold all the cards.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing Facet web interface

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Where Facet stores your database and uploads. IMPORTANT: Back this up regularly!

Config.Name: Encryption Key
Config.Description: REQUIRED: Generate with 'openssl rand -hex 32'. Used to encrypt AI API keys and tokens. NEVER share this!

Config.Name: Admin Emails
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of emails allowed to log in (e.g., you@gmail.com,admin@example.com). Leave empty to allow any authenticated user.

Config.Name: App URL
Config.Description: Your public URL. For Cloudflare Tunnel: https://facet.yourdomain.com. For local access: http://tower.local:8080

Config.Name: Trust Proxy
Config.Description: Set to 'true' if behind Cloudflare Tunnel, nginx, or Traefik. This enables proper IP detection for rate limiting.

Config.Name: Google OAuth Client ID
Config.Description: Optional: Enable Google login. Get from Google Cloud Console.

Config.Name: Google OAuth Client Secret
Config.Description: Optional: Google OAuth secret. Keep this private!

Config.Name: GitHub OAuth Client ID
Config.Description: Optional: Enable GitHub login. Get from GitHub Developer Settings.

Config.Name: GitHub OAuth Client Secret
Config.Description: Optional: GitHub OAuth secret. Keep this private!

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: Optional: Enable AI-powered content improvement with OpenAI (GPT-4, etc.)

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Optional: Enable AI-powered content improvement with Anthropic Claude (recommended)

Config.Name: Ollama Base URL
Config.Description: Optional: Use local Ollama for AI features (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:11434)

Config.Name: Ollama Model
Config.Description: Optional: Ollama model to use (default: llama3.2)

Config.Name: Enable PocketBase Admin UI
Config.Description: Enable PocketBase admin UI at /_/ (disabled by default for security). Only enable temporarily when needed.
